column5: With the winds the way they are I'm staying off the water tonight and thought I would share some photos of the first week of fishing for that one big bite.  I won't bore you with details, so here's a quick photo summary of my solo salmon hunting adventures.                                                  My brother decided to get a ticket and join me when he can which is great news.  He was able to land his new PB show above at 28.2 lbs his first night fishing the derby with me.  It's going to take a lot more than that to place though, like 33lbs +!  Bring on Week 2!  Tony

Awesome.   I have not had the chance to get out since Saturday.  Going tomorrow morning.    Nice job Tony.  Love those SD's with the black base and green.  I just picked up 2 today.  I can't wait to try them.
Solo? If you need a deck hand/photographer give me a call!  Or do I need a ticket even if I'm not fishing?  Some nice fish there Tony!
Everyone in the boat needs a ticket.
Tony, piss off! And I mean that in the kindest way possible.
Thats alot of silver Tony.  I would wish you a healthy 50,but my bro has it coming.LOL  Thanks for sharing and good luck in the derby.
nice shootin!!!! man thats a healthy looking shot of the fish finder....  good on ya ...keep plugging away ....trust me ....lightning can strike the same person twice!!!
Awesome job out there. I like the double header picture.
Nice fish man....when you see that screen on your graph its hammer time!
Looks like tomorrow is worse weather than today.  33 knot winds in Western Lake Ontario tomorrow.    Crap.
good shootin Tony!!  that double must have been heart-pounding fun!! me thinks you need another partner when your bro can't make it  Jesse
For a one man trip.... you certainly got them dialed in Tony Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Congrats...  The world's best salmon fishery, without question...
